personal.name: Vivek Kumar
personal.title: Software Developer
personal.about: Experienced Software Developer with 4 years of expertise in building user-centric mobile and web applications for Ed-tech and Food Delivery startups. Proficient in cross-platform development using Flutter, Android (Java/Kotlin), and ReactJS/React Native, demonstrating adaptability and a wide skill set. Passionate about creating innovative solutions that address real-world problems, with a proven track record of successful app development and deployment.

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description: Leading Android development initiatives and implementing modern Android practices.
achievements: Android App: Allow garage or parking attendant to issue and manage parking tickets.
Admin Dashboard: Backoffice to manage garages and companies and its devices.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained multiple applications for the platform.
achievements: Android App: To login and display user's courses registered with Think Cloudly.
Admin Dashboard: A dashboard to manage data hosted on AWS DynamoDB.
Admin Dashboard Backend: A Rest API using NodeJS + ExpressJS
